channel.title: Posts on Fireflies platform development docs
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Fireflies platform development docs

item.title: Update 29 Aug 21
item.description: Update 29 Aug Summary Aiming to do functional testing & showcase of mentor registration & profile features in 2 weeks Security for registration and private pages will be gradually enforced Project is now named Fireflies Current features in dev Mentor registration for invited users Mentor listing & profile display for all visitors Backend security Notes Email verification during registration with Amazon SES Get features to function first before adjusting based on figma design How to set up redis server for backend security and also testing Get started on documenting backend APIs Monthly update now Written by Ha Nguyen, 8 Aug

item.title: Starting the technical doc site
item.description: Technical doc site is live! What is it about? This site aims to give readers an overview of the features being developed for the SAapp project (name tbc), as well as update current and prospective team members on technical progress and benchmarks. Hopefully will facilitate communication between the different roles within the team (backend, frontend, devops). SAapp project This project includes building and running a platform for student consultancy and networking among university alumnus.
